name: Letter to the Destin
description:
An entry for 

My First Game Jam: Summer 2020.

I made this game in 4 days, on and off. I wanted to go for the jam's theme ("Change"), so my main idea was a letter, from the "Destin" which is the destiny. This game has more finals, There are few endings., a letter with a small "motivational message" :))) and some little aesthetics things. You know you achieved an ending when you are  moved in main menu. I could make MORE things to make this a full game but you know.. no time, and i rushed everything to join this contest. Enjoy my game.
